mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (parent_id, name, icon, url, type, order, status, update_user, update_time) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now());
mapper.select: select distinct sm.id, sm.parent_id as parentId, sm.name as name, sm.icon as icon, sm.url as url, sm.type as type, sm.order, sm.status as status, sm.update_user as updateUser, sm.update_time as updateTime from sys_role_menu srm , sys_menu sm, sys_user_role sur where sur.role_id = srm.role_id and srm.menu_id = sm.id and sur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sm.order

select sm.id, sm.parent_id as parentId, sm.name as name, sm.icon as icon, sm.url as url, sm.type as type, sm.order, sm.status as status, sm.update_user as updateUser, sm.update_time as updateTime from sys_menu sm, WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
